metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30688 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: needrestart 0.8 through 3.5 before 3.6 is prone to local privilege escalation. Regexes to detect the Perl, Python, and Ruby interpreters are not anchored, allowing a local user to escalate privileges when needrestart tries to detect if interpreters are using old source files.

criterions.comment: needrestart package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
